projects.name: FDR Skatepark
projects.description: FDR is one of the largest DIY skateparks in the world, built for skateboarders by skateboarders.
projects.details: We're all coming together to help maintain the park from one of the harshest winters we've seen in a while. We're fixing up damaged concrete, filling in cracks and potholes, repainting the whole park, and fixing/replacing some of the pool coping. All extra money will go towards the new bowl being built next to the vert ramp. Every dollar counts! Thanks for your support!
